name: Power Rangers: Legacy Wars
storyline: Rita Repulsa, the space witch, has infected the Morphin Grid! She has stepped into the Morphin Grid itself. Her goal? To destroy the legacy of the Power Rangers by infecting the Grid from within, decimating the Power forever. With the very multiverse at stake, Zordon has chosen a civilian with attitude: YOU! It is up to you to enter the Morphin Grid, defeat Rita Repulsa and reestablish the connection to the Power. But it is no easy task. Rita has been able to manipulate the reality inside the Grid and create virtual Ranger clones and monsters programmed to fight for evil!
summary: You, the player, must use special Zeo Shards given to you by Zordon to beat Rita at her own game. Fight back with your own curated team of legendary Power Rangers and villains from the multiverse! Unlock new Rangers, upgrade your best fighters and create the best team to defeat Rita, and save the Morphin Grid. May the Power protect you!
